parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/data-management-service/latest/getuseractivetenant) operation to query the tenant ID.
